title: A preparatiue for the new Passeouer very profitable to be perused and read of all those who are called to the holy table of our Lord / by Maister William Cowper ...
author: Cowper, William, 1568-1619.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by William Ferebrand, and are to bee solde in the Popes-head Pallace, nere the Royal Exchange,
